motif.name: NES/CRM1
motif.summary: Leucine-rich nuclear export signal (NES) binding to the CRM1 exportin protein

definition.name: Recommended
definition.description: Regular expression updated and PSSM computed with ValidNES, DUBs and Ligases without assay scores

definition.name: Relaxed
definition.description: Use when more candidates needed. Regular expression relaxed and PSSM computed with ValidNES, DUBs and Ligases without assay scores

definition.name: Wregex A
definition.description: Regular expression derived from ELM and PSSM computed with NESsential training set

definition.name: Wregex B
definition.description: Regular expression derived from ELM and PSSM computed with ValidNES and DUBs

definition.name: Wregex C
definition.description: Regular expression updated and PSSM computed with DUBs and Ligases without assay scores

definition.name: Wregex D
definition.description: Regular expression updated and PSSM computed with DUBs and Ligases using assay scores

reference.authors: Prieto, G., Fullaondo, A. and Rodriguez, J. A.
reference.title: Prediction of nuclear export signals using weighted regular expressions (Wregex)

definition.name: Original
definition.description: Original ELM regular expression. The PSSM has been computed from the 32 instances available at ELM

definition.name: Extended
definition.description: Extended regular expression considering flanking residues interaction. The PSSM has been computed from the 32 instances available at ELM

reference.authors: Singh, M., Krajewski, M., Mikolajka, A., and Holak, T. A.
reference.title: Molecular determinants for the complex formation between the retinoblastoma protein and LXCXE sequences

motif.name: NLS_Bipartite
motif.summary: Bipartite variant of the classical basically charged NLS

definition.name: ELME000276
definition.description: Original ELM regular expression. The PSSM has been computed from the 9 instances available at ELM

motif.name: NLS_MonoCore
motif.summary: Monopartite variant of the classical basically charged NLS. Strong core version

definition.name: ELME000270
definition.description: Original ELM regular expression. The PSSM has been computed from the 17 instances available at ELM

motif.name: NLS_MonoExtC
motif.summary: Monopartite variant of the classical basically charged NLS. C-extended version

definition.name: ELME000278
definition.description: Original ELM regular expression. The PSSM has been computed from the 18 instances available at ELM

motif.name: NLS_MonoExtN
motif.summary: Monopartite variant of the classical basically charged NLS. N-extended version

definition.name: ELME000271
definition.description: Original ELM regular expression. The PSSM has been computed from the 26 instances available at ELM
